Name.en: Gizmek Inari, the Grain Storage Fox

Effect.en:
Each time your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster(s): Inflict 300 damage to them. You can only use each of the following effects of "Gizmek Inari, the Grain Storage Fox" once per turn.
● If a monster(s) is Special Summoned from the Deck: You can Special Summon this card from your hand.
● If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; Special Summon from your hand or Deck, 1 monster with its ATK/DEF the same, and with the same Attribute as that target.
